rows.label: qev075502_MSG0001
rows.name:
[ST:playername ]? What are you doing here,
old friend? Did you come for a match?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang about Go Rogan's request.

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0020
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0021
rows.name: Nod and adopt a battle stance.

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0002
rows.name:
Do you speak true? There's a lunatic out here attacking
anyone and everyone they come across?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0003
rows.name:
Most strange. I've been training here for a long while
and haven't seen anything like that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Hmm? Who have I been training with?
Oh, just any strong-looking folk who pass by.
Whenever I see them, I challenge them to a...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh. Ah. I...I see. It appears the lunatic you are looking
for is most likely...me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0030
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang he should learn from this.

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0040
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0041
rows.name: Insist that there must be another culprit.

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0006
rows.name:
It seems I was so wrapped up in my training that I
got a little carried away. ...Or a lot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0007
rows.name:
Thank you, old friend. I will go apologize at once.
Oh, but before I do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0008
rows.name:
If someone were picking fights around here,
I would certainly have taken them out by now.
No, the fault is mine and mine alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0009
rows.name:
I will go apologize to everyone at once.
Oh, but first...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0010
rows.name:
Let us have a match, you and I! I think I have finally
trained enough to get the edge on you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0011
rows.name: You never disappoint.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I warn you now, I have been practicing on every
strong-looking person who wandered past.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0013
rows.name:
I've come up with a new moveâ€”a real killer!
You're not beating me this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0014
rows.name:
We're going to need more space than this.
Let's head to the second terrane of Talon Rock.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0015
rows.name: Not again...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0016
rows.name:
That move was an old Hundred Hellions standby.
It was my grandfather's specialty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0017
rows.name:
I always thought it was amazing, but it's only since
landing on Mira that I've actually been able to perform
it myself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0018
rows.name:
I cannot even fathom how strong you are! No matter
how hard I train, I don't feel like I'm catching up at all.
This is my life, and yet I'm starting to bore of trying...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0050
rows.name: Encourage

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0051
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that you only won by a hair.

rows.label: qev075502_JNK0060
rows.name: Taunt

rows.label: qev075502_SEL0061
rows.name: Smirk and ask Gi Zang if he's giving up already.

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0019
rows.name:
Then said hair is a mile wide!
You truly put me to shame, old friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0020
rows.name:
You are the finest rival a warrior could ask for.
Fighting someone as skilled as you is enough to
make me forget about getting revenge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0021
rows.name:
Rrgh, but I still hate losing! Next time!
Next time for sure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0022
rows.name: You are cruel. And more than that, you are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0023
rows.name:
You are the finest rival a warrior could ask for!
How can one give up when they have an opponent
as tough and yet friendly as you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0024
rows.name:
I do not care how badly you trounce me,
I am not giving up. I will get you next time for sure![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0025
rows.name:
And with that loss fresh in my memory, I shall head
back to town and apologize to everyone I have
victimized with my so-called "training."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0026
rows.name:
Thinking on it, I really didn't hold back on them...
Do you think they'll forgive me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0027
rows.name:
He says my grandfather and the other Hellions saved
his life during the war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0028
rows.name:
And since he owes a life-debt to them,
he is forgiving my transgressions.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0029
rows.name:
I did not expect my grandfather would still be bailing
me out of trouble here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075502_MSG0030
rows.name: I need to shape up and do the Hellions proud![ST:wait ]
